description:
After Geralt`s freak accident, Wein visits Marquess Antgadull, who denies the rebellion plot. Wein is attacked but not by Antgadull, and his man on the inside foils a separate plot. Pursued by Antgadull, Wein flees but has another ace up his sleeve.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Sou Da, Tsumi o Kabusete Miyou
そうだ, 罪を被せてみよう
